name: df-sec
body: |- wceq(csec, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cc, wne(cfv(ccos, cv(s1)), nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(ccos, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the secant function. We define it this way for ~ cmpt , which requires the form ` ( x e. A |-> B ) ` . The sec function is defined in ISO 80000-2:2009(E) operation 2-13.6 and "NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions" section on "Trigonometric Functions" ~ http://dlmf.nist.gov/4.14 (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 14-Mar-2014.)
